name: Stop It Now - A Party Game to Play with Friends
name_original: Stop It Now - A Party Game to Play with Friends
description:
STOP IT NOW !!! Seriously ! You have got to stop it and right NOW !!
This is a thrilling simple party game where you and your friends have to try to stop the timer at the given target in a round of 5 !
Let's see which one of you is the best at stopping it !!!
May the best Stopper Win !
